name: SaFaTor, a falling sand simulator
description:
SaFaTor is a sand falling simulator that allows you to use multiple elements and check its behavor and how they react. Currently is in alpha 1.0, so a lot of content is about to be added, although you can make some fun things already.

Please, any bug or suggestion to be added to the game can be posted on the comments section, I'll appreciate some feedback.
